rows.label: qst102702_msg0001
rows.name: Welcome to the Smaia Clinic.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0002
rows.name:
I see... A case like that
would certainly be difficult
for other doctors.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0003
rows.name:
Unfortunately, Doctor Smaia
is not here at the moment.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0004
rows.name:
She's on a trip to
Temperantia, as part of
her research on a new remedy.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0005
rows.name:
She is working out of the
Superbian army's garrison.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0006
rows.name:
If you are in a hurry, it would be
best to go directly to her there.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0007
rows.name:
Not at all. I apologize that
I could not be of more help
after you came all this way.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0008
rows.name:
...Please try not to be surprised
when you meet the Doctor.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0009
rows.name:
She is a rather peculiar person, so
everyone is a bit taken aback...

rows.label: qst102702_msg0101
rows.name:
Doctor Smaia should be at the Superbian
army garrison in Temperantia.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0102
rows.name: Please be careful.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0201
rows.name:
Doctor Smaia has returned...
It's going to get lively
around here again.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0301
rows.name:
Which ingredient would
you like to discuss?

rows.label: qst102702_msg0302
rows.name: (Which one should I ask about?)

rows.label: qst102702_msg0303
rows.name: Gloomwood Root

rows.label: qst102702_msg0304
rows.name: Cloud Sea Rock Salt

rows.label: qst102702_msg0305
rows.name: A long-life root vegetable

rows.label: qst102702_msg0321
rows.name:
I hear Gloomwood Root can be
gathered in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0322
rows.name:
As it's a root, you should be able
to find it in an area with plants.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0341
rows.name:
I hear Cloud Sea Rock Salt can be
gathered on the Cliffs of Morytha.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0342
rows.name:
You should be able to collect
it in rocky areas like caves.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0361
rows.name:
It's a tough one, isn't it... The
doctor makes some unreasonable
demands. Please forgive her.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0362
rows.name:
Come to think of it, I believe I heard
a story about someone growing a new
kind of vegetable in Torigoth...

rows.label: qst102702_msg0363
rows.name:
It would probably be best to
check with the locals there.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0401
rows.name: Shall I explain about Dragon Incense?

rows.label: qst102702_msg0402
rows.name: (What should I do?)

rows.label: qst102702_msg0403
rows.name: Listen to the explanation.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0404
rows.name: Don't listen.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0420
rows.name:
Dragon Incense is the crystallized
secretions from the stomach of
the Invidian Divine Beast.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0421
rows.name:
It is gathered in small quantities, but
due to its pleasant aroma and medicinal
properties, it is traded at high prices.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0422
rows.name:
True Dragon Incense is a high-grade
variety with high purity.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0423
rows.name:
It was once said that a single
piece of True Dragon Incense
could buy you a house.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0424
rows.name:
It is a characteristic
unique to Invidia, not seen
in other Divine Beasts.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0425
rows.name:
...That should cover it. Well
then, please be careful.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0450
rows.name:
Very well. In that case,
please be careful.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0501
rows.name:
So you've obtained the True Dragon
Incense. I can tell by the smell.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0502
rows.name: Ahhh... I could smell this forever.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0601
rows.name:
Man-Eaters... I had thought them
to be the stuff of legends.

rows.label: qst102702_msg0602
rows.name:
To think they actually exist! I'm
surprised! I would love to see one.
